QuestData.Title: WANTED: Kil'uun
QuestData.Description: I have a bounty set on a bird, commander. Yes, a bird.$B$BThe issue is this thing is massive, and it was last sighted a stone's throw away from the Horde base to the south in the forest. The locals call it Kil'uun.$B$BIf you'd like to track the creature down and bring back its beak I wager it would fetch a sack or two of gold for your coffers!
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt Kil'uun and bring its beak to Patrick Messer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Any luck tracking down that bird, commander?
QuestData.RewardText: I have no idea how you managed to track down the creature so close to the Horde base, but well done $Gsir:madame;.
